trans-unit.source: Establishes a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized*> property for use by the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized*>供.NET Framework 基礎結構的屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized*>

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the IXmlTextParser interface in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該在程式碼中實作 IXmlTextParser 介面。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
Gets or sets whether white space and attribute values are normalized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否空白字元與屬性值會正規化。

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and Normalized property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>介面和程式碼中的 Normalized 屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if white space attributes values are normalized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果空白字元屬性值會正規化。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how white space is handled when parsing XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定剖析 XML 時，如何處理空白字元。

trans-unit.source: You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>介面和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A>程式碼中的屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser>

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
A member of the <xref href="System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling"></xref> enumeration that describes how whites pace is handled when parsing XML.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling"></xref>剖析 XML 時，處理列舉，描述如何白色步調。
